DOC.brief_summary: To study the effect of Diclofenac drops or Dexamethasone drops on combined surgery of trabeculectomy and cataract surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Diclofenac vs Dexamethasone in Combined Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients scheduled for combines surgery of trabeculectomy and cataract surgery severe complicated surgery like vitreal loss, expulsive hemorrhage, endophthalmitis
